title: Minimo
description: Minimo is a simple 2D action packed Mini Online RPG. Pick between 2 factions, fight monsters to become stronger and defeat the enemy in fast paced PvP. Thats the goal at least :) ( I stream the development on twitch )

title: Aukedora
description: Aukedora is my dream project. An MMORPG that takes me back in time, when things were simpler. It is a huge project to do by myself. So the only right decision is of course to make a smaller MMORPG first. ( It is already playable >.< )

title: Gunflinger
description: A delightful and casual mini-game that takes you to the Wild West theatre where a rabbit cowboy steals the show! Get ready to witness incredible tricks as our gunslinger flings himself through the air, collecting bullets to keep the performance going.

title: The Idle Lumberer
description: The Idle Lumberer is a simplistic idle game. You simply chop down trees for logs, and sell them for upgrades.

title: Tilting Ship
description: Tilting Ship is a casual game, where you attempt to evade upcoming obstacles. I used this project to learn about the gyroscope in mobile devices and how to use it.

title: Reactangle
description: Reactangle is a simple, reaction time game. Go test your reaction time. ^^

title: Drudge
description: Drudge is my first proper attempt on random world generation. It consists of randomly generated levels which you must try to complete by reaching the end. If there is one. 'Enjoy getting lost in the library sewer.'

title: Spores
description: A game that's all about finding your inner peace and having a chill time. You play as a little blue spore with the goal to collect green spores while avoiding those sneaky purple ones.
